method.name: Boolean
method.shortdesc: Creates and returns a new Boolean object set to the value of the argument converted to a boolean.

parameters.name: value
parameters.shortdesc: The value to be converted to a Boolean.

method.name: toString
method.shortdesc: Returns the string representation of the value of bool.
method.description: The method returns the string true if the primitive value of bool is true; otherwise it returns the string false.

method.name: valueOf
method.shortdesc: Returns the primitive value of bool.
method.description: The method returns true if the primitive value of bool is true; otherwise it returns false.
